page.title: 16FARMING
page.content: FARMING. This is a very versatile area, field crops include Wheat, Barley, Oats & Rye. Root crops- Potatoes, Carrots, Cabbage, Turnip, Sugar Beet, & Swede. There is also grazing land for cattle (meat) not milking, and sheep. The farms hve been in most cases passed down from father to son, or when the acreage is large from father to sons. The buildings are in a good state of repair. The farm houses outwardly seem little changed, not so the interiors these have in most cases been modernised and made much more comfortble. Farmimg is done be machinery, combines, and tractors are a common sight.Electrified Fences are used to confine stock. Dogs serve as pets and guard-dogs. A few Jacob Sheep are to be seen, the fleece being very popular with the ladies who spin.
